page.title: 15Television programmes 1985
page.content: Television is a machine on which you can watch programmes.I watch "Street Hawk," it is about a motor cycle that can do amazing things. It can jump over cars and lorries,it has immense fire power and also has hyper thrust. This programme is on Central Television at 7:30 p.m. After Street Hawk it's Lenny Henry,he is a comedian and always tells jokes, this programme is on BBC 1. As I watch this programme I am taping,on my video recorder, a programme on Central T.V. called Minder, to watch later.All of these programmes are on a Thursday evening. On Friday I watch 'Don't wait up,'it is about a man and his son who are both called Doctor Latimer,and they are always getting mixed up.After that I watch 'Cover up.'
